meanings.definition: Washes clothes before the main washing process.
meanings.sent1: She prewashes her delicate clothes to ensure they stay in good condition.
meanings.sent2: Mom always prewashes the laundry to remove any stains before the main wash.
meanings.sent3: The cat prewashes its fur meticulously before settling down for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The chef prewashes the vegetables with care, like a painter preparing a canvas.
meanings.sent5: Before painting, the artist prewashes the brushes to ensure the colors blend smoothly.

meanings.definition: The act of washing clothes before the main washing process.
meanings.sent1: The prewashes help in removing tough stains from the clothes.
meanings.sent2: I always do prewashes to make sure the laundry comes out clean.
meanings.sent3: The prewashes in the laundry routine make the whole process more efficient.
meanings.sent4: The prewashes are essential for maintaining the quality of the clothes.
meanings.sent5: Her meticulous prewashes ensure that the clothes last longer.
